column2: You decide to take a stroll in the countryside to relieve some stress. Whilst walking you come upon a large stone in a clearing. What makes this stone unusual is the large sword buried in it, with only the bejewelled hilt visible.
I feel drawn to the power of this artefact.
What is this? Someone's idea of a practical joke?
Look at the size of those gemstones!
A sword in a stone? That's it, I'm out of here.
As you draw near, you feel the power of the stone fill you. You feel you could do anything.
I shall claim it for my own!
I will examine the weapon first.
If this is a joke, maybe we can use it to our benefit.
A joke like this would be mean. I'll just go home.
As you draw near, you see the many jewels sparkle in the sunlight. Each is most likely worth a small fortune.
I bet I can get these jewels and make a fortune.
I will examine the weapon first.
You Place Your Hands on the Sword
You stand next to the stone and place both hands on the sword. In a moment you will try to remove it from its prison.
You Take a Closer Look at the Sword
You approach the sword and take a closer look at the markings on it. Your head swims and your vision blurs as you try to understand the meaning of the runes.
